TopicTitle: Where to get .NET 2.0 .dll for compiling mods?

Articles.Content:
Edit: i figured out how to fix this after mucking around in Vstudio, needed to tell the program to use 2.0 instead of the rest, although my mods still wont compile ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif).

Anyways, can a mod delete this threa,d as i kinda solved my own problem
